traceability.evidence: The `valid-annotation-format` rule (src/rules/valid-annotation-format.ts) implements all required checks (REQ-FORMAT-SPECIFICATION, REQ-SYNTAX-VALIDATION, REQ-PATH-FORMAT, REQ-REQ-FORMAT) and is wired into the plugin index. The dedicated test suite (tests/rules/valid-annotation-format.test.ts) runs 3 valid and 4 invalid scenarios covering single‐line story annotations, single‐line req annotations, JSDoc block annotations, missing path, wrong extension, missing req ID, and malformed req ID. All of those tests pass (as shown in jest-report.json), demonstrating correct behavior and specific error reporting for format violations.
traceability.notes: The implementation meets the core functionality, provides clear error messages, handles multiline/JSDoc annotations, integrates with the plugin config, and follows ESLint rule best practices. Documentation examples exist in the story file. Therefore, this story is fully implemented.
